resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Patient Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints and extensions on the patient resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve patient demographic information.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Birth Sex Extension
resource.description: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth.

resource.name: Case Based Surveillance Race Extension
resource.description: Concepts classifying the person into a named category of humans sharing common history, traits, geographical origin or nationality.
